description.en: Spend 3 Hope to force an adversary within Far range to reroll an attack or damage roll.
description.ru: Spend 3 Hope to force an adversary within Far range to reroll an attack or damage roll.

description.en: You can perform harmless, subtle magical effects at will.
description.ru: You can perform harmless, subtle magical effects at will.

description.en: Choose a number between 1 and 12. When you roll that number on a Duality Die, gain a Hope or clear a Stress. You can change this number when you take a long rest.
description.ru: Choose a number between 1 and 12. When you roll that number on a Duality Die, gain a Hope or clear a Stress. You can change this number when you take a long rest.

description.en: When you Utilize an Experience, you can mark a Stress instead of spending a Hope. If you do, double your Experience modifier for that roll.
description.ru: When you Utilize an Experience, you can mark a Stress instead of spending a Hope. If you do, double your Experience modifier for that roll.

description.en: When you recall a domain card in your vault, you can reduce its Recall Cost by 1.
description.ru: When you recall a domain card in your vault, you can reduce its Recall Cost by 1.

description.en: When you use an Experience, roll a d6. On a result of 5 or higher, you can use it without spending Hope.
description.ru: When you use an Experience, roll a d6. On a result of 5 or higher, you can use it without spending Hope.

description.en: When you succeed with Fear on an attack roll, you deal an extra 1d10 magic damage.
description.ru: When you succeed with Fear on an attack roll, you deal an extra 1d10 magic damage.

description.en: While you have at least 2 Hope, you add your Proficiency to your Evasion.
description.ru: While you have at least 2 Hope, you add your Proficiency to your Evasion.

description.en: When you succeed with Fear on an attack roll, you deal an extra 2d10 magic damage.
description.ru: When you succeed with Fear on an attack roll, you deal an extra 2d10 magic damage.

description.en: When you succeed on an attack, you can mark a Stress after rolling damage to force the target to mark an additional Hit Point.
description.ru: When you succeed on an attack, you can mark a Stress after rolling damage to force the target to mark an additional Hit Point.

description.en: When you succeed with Fear on an attack roll, you deal an extra 3d10 magic damage.
description.ru: When you succeed with Fear on an attack roll, you deal an extra 3d10 magic damage.
